label: 含綬鳥
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 56th  . Nara National Museum . 2004
説明文: The motif of a bird carrying a strand of beads or a ribbon in its beak. Originating in Sassanian Persia and also seen in Byzantine art, this motif traveled across Central Asia through China and into Japan via the Silk Road. See also Hanakuidori. [花喰鳥]
